summary: Manchester is a city in England with about 568,996 people. It's part of a bigger area called Greater Manchester, which has nearly 3 million people. The city started with a Roman fort and grew quickly during the Industrial Revolution because of its textile factories. It became the world's first industrialized city. Manchester has faced challenges, like a decline after World War II and an IRA bombing in 1996, but it has rebuilt and hosted the 2002 Commonwealth Games. It's known for its culture, music, science, and sports. The city has many famous inventions, like the first stored-program computer.
title: Manchester
